verses.verse: And when any <S%H5315><s%> one offereth <S%H7126><s%> an oblation <S%H7133><s%> of a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, his oblation <S%H7133><s%> shall be of fine flour <S%H5560><s%>; and he shall pour <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon it <S%H5414><s%>, and put frankincense thereon <S%H3828><s%>:

and he shall bring <S%H935><s%> it to Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%>; and he shall take <S%H7061><s%> thereout <S%H8033><s%> his handful <S%H7062><s%> of the fine flour <S%H5560><s%> thereof <S%H8081><s%>, and of the oil thereof <S%H3828><s%>, with all the frankincense thereof <S%H3548><s%>. And the priest shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it as the memorial <S%H234><s%> thereof upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>:

and that which is left <S%H3498><s%> of the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s and his sons <S%H1121><s%>': it is a thing most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>.

And when thou offerest <S%H7126><s%> an oblation <S%H7133><s%> of a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> baken <S%H3989><s%> in the oven <S%H8574><s%>, it shall be unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, or unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And if thy oblation <S%H7133><s%> be a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> of the baking-pan <S%H4227><s%>, it shall be of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>.
Thou shalt part <S%H6626><s%> it in pieces <S%H6595><s%>, and pour <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> thereon <S%H4503><s%>: it is a meal-offering.
And if thy oblation <S%H7133><s%> be a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> of the frying-pan <S%H4802><s%>, it shall be made <S%H6213><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> that is made <S%H6213><s%> of these things unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and it shall be presented <S%H7126><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and he shall bring <S%H5066><s%> it unto the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H7311><s%> up from the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> the memorial <S%H234><s%> thereof <S%H6999><s%>, and shall burn it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And that which is left <S%H3498><s%> of the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s and his sons <S%H1121><s%>': it is a thing most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>.

No meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, which ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, shall be made <S%H6213><s%> with leaven <S%H2557><s%>; for ye shall burn <S%H6999><s%> no leaven <S%H2557><s%>, nor any honey <S%H1706><s%>, as an offering <S%H801><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

As an oblation <S%H7133><s%> of first <S%H7225><s%>- fruits ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> them unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: but they shall not come up <S%H5927><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And every oblation <S%H7133><s%> of thy meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> shalt thou season <S%H4414><s%> with salt <S%H4417><s%>; neither shalt thou suffer the salt <S%H4417><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of thy God <S%H430><s%> to be lacking <S%H7673><s%> from thy meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>: with all thine oblations <S%H7133><s%> thou shalt offer <S%H7126><s%> salt <S%H4417><s%>.

And if thou offer <S%H7126><s%> a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> of first-fruits <S%H1061><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou shalt offer <S%H7126><s%> for the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> of thy first-fruits <S%H1061><s%> grain in the ear <S%H24><s%> parched <S%H7033><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, bruised <S%H1643><s%> grain of the fresh ear <S%H3759><s%>.
And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon it <S%H7760><s%>, and lay frankincense <S%H3828><s%> thereon <S%H4503><s%>: it is a meal-offering.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> the memorial <S%H234><s%> of it <S%H1643><s%>, part of the bruised grain thereof <S%H8081><s%>, and part of the oil thereof <S%H3828><s%>, with all the frankincense thereof <S%H801><s%>: it is an offering made by fire unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
